snippet.title: Save The Village - Official Pre-Release Trailer | Medieval Tower Defense Game
snippet.description:
Welcome to "Save The Village!" 🏰💀

In this medieval tower defense game, it’s up to YOU to protect the villages from waves of skeletons, goblins, and terrifying bosses. Build powerful towers, upgrade your defenses, and strategically outsmart your enemies to keep the villagers safe! With unique villages, each presenting new challenges and enemies, your tactical skills will be put to the test.

🌟 Features:
Defend beautifully crafted villages, each with its own atmosphere and threats.
Face off against waves of enemies, including skeleton archers, marauders, and wizards.
Build and upgrade towers to create the ultimate defense.
Survive epic boss battles in each village!
A fantasy world filled with strategy, action, and medieval charm.
⚔️ Wishlist "Save The Village" on Steam now and prepare for the ultimate defense challenge!

📅 Release Date: Coming Soon
💻 Platform: PC (Steam)

Follow us for updates: 
🔗 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3229540
🔗 Twitter: https://x.com/ZuptiGames
🔗 Website: https://www.zupti.com/
